title: Support took 3cs.
body:
Might withhold Anger since they got me a few kills.


Ooh they're at 7 now, time to unleash the beast.

$#%$#^#$^@%!#@$@!#.

replies.body: OMFG. What a troll. Did you report him after? Hope you won dude. Must of been hard to carry with 7 less cs!
I can't find the "report scrub support" section. Can you please direct me. We won anyway, but it was game-breaking - Riot should do something about this.
